meanings.definition: To remove the classification from (information, a document, etc.)
meanings.sent1: The government declassified the old files for everyone to read.
meanings.sent2: The military declassified the top-secret documents after many years.
meanings.sent3: It was a relief when they declassified the recipe for the famous dish.
meanings.sent4: Her smile declassified the tension in the room instantly.
meanings.sent5: The magician declassified his magic trick, revealing the secret to the audience.
